<a id="class_EditorDebuggerSession"></a>

# EditorDebuggerSession

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A class to interact with the editor debugger.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This class cannot be directly instantiated and must be retrieved via an [EditorDebuggerPlugin](class_editordebuggerplugin.md).

You can add tabs to the session UI via [add_session_tab()](class_editordebuggersession.md#class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_add_session_tab), send messages via [send_message()](class_editordebuggersession.md#class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_send_message), and toggle [EngineProfiler](class_engineprofiler.md)\ s via [toggle_profiler()](class_editordebuggersession.md#class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_toggle_profiler).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Signals

<a id="class_EditorDebuggerSession_signal_breaked"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**breaked**\ (\ can_debug\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorDebuggerSession_signal_breaked)

Emitted when the attached remote instance enters a break state. If `can_debug` is ``true``, the remote instance will enter the debug loop.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorDebuggerSession_signal_continued"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**continued**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorDebuggerSession_signal_continued)

Emitted when the attached remote instance exits a break state.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorDebuggerSession_signal_started"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**started**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorDebuggerSession_signal_started)

Emitted when a remote instance is attached to this session (i.e. the session becomes active).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorDebuggerSession_signal_stopped"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**stopped**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorDebuggerSession_signal_stopped)

Emitted when a remote instance is detached from this session (i.e. the session becomes inactive).

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_add_session_tab"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_session_tab**\ (\ control\: [Control](class_control.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_add_session_tab)

Adds the given `control` to the debug session UI in the debugger bottom panel. The `control`'s node name will be used as the tab title.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_is_active"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_active**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_is_active)

Returns ``true`` if the debug session is currently attached to a remote instance.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_is_breaked"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_breaked**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_is_breaked)

Returns ``true`` if the attached remote instance is currently in the debug loop.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_is_debuggable"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_debuggable**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_is_debuggable)

Returns ``true`` if the attached remote instance can be debugged.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_remove_session_tab"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_session_tab**\ (\ control\: [Control](class_control.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_remove_session_tab)

Removes the given `control` from the debug session UI in the debugger bottom panel.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_send_message"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **send_message**\ (\ message\: [String](class_string.md), data\: [Array](class_array.md) = []\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_send_message)

Sends the given `message` to the attached remote instance, optionally passing additionally `data`. See [EngineDebugger](class_enginedebugger.md) for how to retrieve those messages.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_set_breakpoint"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_breakpoint**\ (\ path\: [String](class_string.md), line\: [int](class_int.md), enabled\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_set_breakpoint)

Enables or disables a specific breakpoint based on `enabled`, updating the Editor Breakpoint Panel accordingly.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_toggle_profiler"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **toggle_profiler**\ (\ profiler\: [String](class_string.md), enable\: [bool](class_bool.md), data\: [Array](class_array.md) = []\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_EditorDebuggerSession_method_toggle_profiler)

Toggle the given `profiler` on the attached remote instance, optionally passing additionally `data`. See [EngineProfiler](class_engineprofiler.md) for more details.
